```{r echo = FALSE}
for (i in 1:10) {
  seed <- sample.int(.Machine$integer.max, 1)
  set.seed(seed)
  p1 <- generate_mandala(colors = FALSE)
  set.seed(seed)
  p2 <- generate_mandala(colors = TRUE)
  gridExtra::grid.arrange(p2, p1, layout_matrix = matrix(c(
    2, 2, 2, 2, NA,
    2, 2, 2, 2, NA,
    2, 2, 2, 2, NA,
    2, 2, 2, 1, 1,
    NA, NA, NA, 1, 1
  ), byrow = TRUE, nrow = 5, ncol = 5))
}
```
